verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Moving past the brazen altar Passing through the holy place Enter in before His presence See the glory on His face.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious servants of the temple Cease your busyness and toil Now fulfill your deepest ministry Come and satisfy your Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Precious servants of the temple Cease your busyness and toil Now fulfill your deepest ministry Come and satisfy your Lord.{/lang-eng}
